name: win-user-installed-npm-cli-path
description: Resolve the path of `npm-cli.js` included in the user-installed npm on Windows
author: Shinnosuke Watanabe (https://github.com/shinnn)

scripts.test: istanbul cover --dir=coverage/0 tests/non-windows.js && istanbul cover --dir=coverage/1 tests/no-npm.js && istanbul report html
